trans-unit.source: Defines a rectangular hot spot region in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 定义中的一个矩形作用点区域<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a rectangular hot spot region in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义中的一个矩形作用点区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: To define the region of the RectangleHotSpot object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义 RectangleHotSpot 对象的区域，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>属性表示的矩形区域的顶部的 x 坐标值左上角。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>属性表示的矩形区域的顶部的 y 坐标值左上角。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>属性表示的矩形区域的底部右下角的 x 坐标值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 设置的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性表示的矩形区域的底部右下角的 y 坐标值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a RectangleHotSpot control is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 单击 RectangleHotSpot 控件后，在页导航到 URL、 生成回发到服务器，或不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property specifies this behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>属性指定此行为。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To navigate to a URL, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate` and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 若要导航到的 URL，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>属性`HotSpotMode.Navigate`并用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>属性来指定要导航到的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To post back to the server, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack` and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the RectangleHotSpot object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将发布回服务器，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`并用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>属性指定 RectangleHotSpot 对象的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when the RectangleHotSpot is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此名称将传递中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>单击 RectangleHotSpot 时的事件数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to have no behavior, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>对象不具有任何行为，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>属性`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此定义的矩形区域的底边的 y 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Bottom property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: 底部属性允许您获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的底边的 y 坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，你必须指定一个值，此属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此定义的矩形区域的底边 y 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the x -and y-coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示 x-和 y 坐标的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象的左上角和其下 x 和 y 坐标右下角。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that represents the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object's top left corner and the coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个字符串，表示的坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象的左上角和其下的坐标右下角。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> properties to return the coordinates for the top left corner.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用的值分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>要返回的前几位的坐标属性左上角。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: It uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties to return the coordinates for the bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 它将使用分配给值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>要返回的坐标底部右下角属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GetCoordinates method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: GetCoordinates 方法为内部 ASP.NET 可用于获取要使用的坐标的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>呈现时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串为特定于浏览器和标记语言。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 x 和 y 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象的左上角和其下 x 和 y 坐标右下角。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此定义的矩形区域的左侧的 x 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Left property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: 左的属性允许您获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的左侧的 x 坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，你必须指定一个值，此属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此定义的矩形区域的左侧的 x 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此定义的矩形区域的右侧的 x 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Right property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: 其右边缘属性，可获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的右侧的 x 坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象，你必须指定值对于此属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此定义的矩形区域的右侧的 x 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此定义的矩形区域的顶部的 y 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Top property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: Top 属性，可获取或设置一个值，表示此定义的矩形区域的顶部的 y 坐标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: you must specify a value for this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定值对于此属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此定义的矩形区域的顶部的 y 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。
